title: Dazzled
description: When Hollywood calls, is the price for fame too high?Miles Stephens is a young actor from London. Out of work, unemployable, and fired from his last job, he gets the chance to star in a break-out role in a big-time Hollywood film.The film is a great success, propelling him to worldwide Hollywood fame – but it’s not all it’s cracked up to be, and the pressure starts to get to Miles.Throughout, he is supported by his friend, Clare, the girl next door whom he grew up with – and who is secretly in love with him.Miles finds out that fame and fortune isn’t everything he’d dreamed about
author: Jane Harvey-Berrick
